body.p:
Mt Eden, Spencer co. Ky.
Oct. 12th, 1863.
His excellency, Gov Bramlette --
Frankfort:

The bearer of this, Lt. Benj H. Howser, formerly of the 15th Ky. vol inf. Army of the cumberland, and a citizen of this our county, as endeavoring to enlist men in obedience to the late Order for organising The state guard. We as union men take pleasure in attending his loyalty, energy and zeal in the cause of our common country against traitors and factionists: and we are assured that he will discharge the duties fully of any position or trust confided to him in the organisation or command of men for the defense of our state: and we cordially recommend him for any position where his services are needed.

Very Respectfully
W. M. Burnett
W. S. Crutcher M, D,
M L Hudson M, D,
J. C. Burnett sergt of state ^gard^
Zach Hoffman. M. J.
Lt Col
15 Regt Ky
all necessary papers given to him to organize a Coy of S. Gs

Spencer Co Ky Oct, 12 1863
B H Hawser, Capt
authoritiy to organize a coy for S. G. in this Coy
